Articles.Content:
Idk why... but the ksp2 trailers make me emotional. Very well done, and omg the music... -chef kiss-

Got me thinking... what if there was a KSP movie? Even a cute short one.
I think a lot.
Heres what I got.

after ksp1, slight amount of space exploration lets say, Just got to Mun and back for the 3rd time.

Then, during the 4th, something happens. 
A mysterious force rips the ship in half, and blows up. . . sure, blowing up we're used to, but this force stretched parts and broke what laws of kerbin physics they know.
They dub this force, the Kraken.
They plot would be trying to get away from this force. Or, where KSP2 comes in.
Colonization, and other galaxies. Maybe solar system. 

Spoiler, but the kraken is actually an unstoppable other dimensional beast, that sadly rips apart and consumes the Kerbin solar system.
But, the ending of the movie should be like, them crashing on a habital planet, respectfully so, and starting out with nothing again. One kerbal could be trying to make a airplane out of sticks and leaves, and try to throw it, and it flawlessly floats, where everyone should be thinking it would crash or break... "Well, we can start here" or some dialog that would tie it perfectly, and tie in a GOOD song as the dev team does in the trailers.

Idk... I think a lot.
I'd like to know what others think.
accidently posted this twice somewhere in the forums. If a mod doesnt catch that at first, i'm letting someone know

10 minutes ago, JKpart said:

accidently posted this twice somewhere in the forums. If a mod doesnt catch that at first, i'm letting someone know

 

We caught it., and it’s been dealt with.  The best way to get ahold of us, instead of creating a new post, just hit the “report” button on the post in question and tell us what’s going on.   

Edited December 19, 2023 by Gargamel

Be cute to include parts where kerbals break the 3rd wall, or Scott Manley voices an elder character, wishing them well, and to fly safe.
Or also bring in other members for the movie. 

I know its a lot to do, and reality takes hold of having cool ideas. But, gotta admit, it would be cool

 

Edited December 19, 2023 by JKpart
Since this is neither KSP1 nor KSP2 specific, it has been moved to Fanworks
